S.FORM: == Ten-men-san " cen-cia-cei" 天門山 == Ten-min-san " igu : Tianmen Mountain" itida i Cung-kuo Hu-nan-sen Cen-cia-cei se Iun-ten niyaduan, pakunida sananay a aadihan nu Ten-men-tun a nikasinganganan, nika hinian nu Ten-men-tun sa katinengan nu kitakid, pangangan han u "Sin-si sakacacay nu di'tu a buyu'", "U-lin adingu" atu "Cen-cia-cei adingu". 天門山(英語:Tianmen Mountain) ". Hu-nan-sen " Seng a kamu Cen-yi-pen-sin-pay Cen-sa kamu /fu13 lã13 sən41/, seng-yi-luo-saw-pen sung-fun kamu /ɣəu13 nia13 siɛn31, )itida i Cung-hua-zen-min-kun-he-kuo hua-cung kitidaan a sakacacay nu sincenci, pulung nu kitidaan itida i Cen-cieng taban nu timula a kitidaan, hamin itida namin i Tun-tin-hu timula u " Hu-nan", mibetas tu Sieng-cieng sisa " Sieng han". idaw ku langaw nu hu-zun " mu-hu-zun", nikudan Tan ci Tan-un sasasulitan nida tu cuda " milabi tu sadingsing i Sieng-cieng kalikeluhan ku udad" idaw ku " yadahay nu hu-zun a sadingsingan nu kanatal" a sasakamuen, idaw saca tu " hu-zun-kanatal". Hu-nan a sen-huy cen-sa-se, Hu-nan niyadu'an a kamu u Sing-yi ku sasakamuen.duma satu itida i Hu-nan-sen nu dumaan a kitidaan u Si-nan kamu, cen kamu, sing-nan tada kamu, wa-sing kamu atu ngayngay a kamu tu duma a sasakamuen, nikahida, miw kamu, tada kamu, tun kamu, men kamu " yiw binacadan a tapang nu kamuan" pinaay nu binacadan a kamuan itida i Hu-nan-sen tipan atu timula nu pinaay a binacadan ku micukaymasay tina kamuan. :/fu13 lã13 sən41/；湘語婁邵片雙峰話:/ɣəu13 nia13 siɛn31/), . Iun-tin-ci u Cung-kuo Hu-nan-sen Cen-cia-cie se a se-sia niyadu'an. pulung nu niyadu' pin-fun-kun-li, tademaw 52 wan ku tademaw. 52萬人. Ten-men-tun itida i Cung-kuo Hu-nan sen cen-cia-cie Ten-san-men, talakaw 131.5 mi, ahebal 57 mi, i labu 60 mi, i kitakid satalakaway a hida sananay mibetasay tu buyu' ay a zun-tun. . lalangaw 文化 hedek nu Yen-caw, ci Cen-duy miales cinida tu sakakaay taluma' malikeluh nida ci Yen-cuo. ci Yen-cuo kulitan nida ku Ten-men-san, ci Cen-duy cudad hanida atu mikulit: " masalaliw ku bali i labu nu Ten-men-dun, isasa ku Cin-tun-e-mei .", sakamusa : " kana matabal a silaheci, ku mababiyaw kiya i sasa nu buyu'. Cin-caw musulitan tu cudad ci Yi-ci-muo saan: " amica ku nipangawan tu talakaway a buyu', idaw ku sakatayda i pabaw." ." Sing-si tu cia-cu miw kitidaan " tada kamu Xianxxix bifzivkar befkar zifzifzoux,sing-si-miw kamu:Xangdxid tutjadcul maolcul zibzhibzhoud, dayumen pangangan Sing-si-cuo, u Cung-hua-zen-min-kun-he-kuo Hu-nan sen a ce-ce'-cuo, itida i Hu-nan-sen tipan amisan. micapi tu wali amis katukuh i Cen-cia-cei se, wali timu sibiyaw tu Huy-hua se, nutipan timulan sikenis tu Kuy-cuo sen Tun-zen se, nutipan sibiyaw tu Cun-cin se, nutipan amisa mitulin tu Hu-pei sen N-se cuo. :Xianxxix bifzivkar befkar zifzifzoux,湘西苗語:Xangdxid tutjadcul maolcul zibzhibzhoud), . u lala' nu U-lin-buyu'an atu Uen-kuy buyu' a niyadu'a, labu nu buyu' idaw ku masaenalay atu mililisay tu dihep a sauwacan, U-lin buyu' a tapan katukuh i cung pu, mala wali amis -nutipan timulan ku nipasayda ku culil, wali tipan u Yen-cin sauwac a sakay sasa tu nu dihepan a buyu'an, labu nu buyu' yadah ku baba'tuan. Yen sauwac nikalaliwan nu nanum i U- sauwa, Yiu sauwac ku angangangan. pulung nu cuo makaala tu 15,470 pin-fun kun-li, tademaw 246,1 wan ku tademawan, tu-cia binacadan, miw binacadan kakenihan hakiya tu 43%,34%, ce-ce'-cuo u tukay itida i Ci-suo se zen-min-pie-lu 58 ku banggu. 58號. luit 歷史 Sing-si-cuo kitidaan u matenesay tu. sang tay, u di'tuan a kitidaan. Si-cuo katukuh tu cun ciw, u cu-cen a kitidaan. cen-kuo tawya u cu-cen kitidaan. si han u U-lin kitidaan. tuluay a kanatalan tu lingatu u Su, nikudan satu u U. Si-cin, Tun-cin u cin-cuo U-lin kitidaan. suy tan lima a dayan u Cen-cuo. Sun u Cin-hu-pei-lu a Cen-cuo, Fung-cuo. Yen u Hu-kun-han sen N-cuo cin-min-an-hu-se, Sin-ten-ke-luan anhuse atu Se-cun sin-sen iun-sun se. min-ce-iun-sun sin-wi se, paw-cin-cuo sin-wi se, liwan u Yi,cen tusa a kitidaan. Cin-ce-iun-sun hu atu fun-hung, Cin-cuo, Iun-suy celiten, wali amis u Fun cuo kitidaan. minkuo seci. cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku sepat -cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku tusa (1914-1922) mihcaan u Cen-yen-taw u Cen-yen-taw. cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu sepat a bataan idaw ku siwa – cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu sepat a bataan idaw ku siwa (1938—1949) mihcaan u saka walu saka siwa a sincen tuca niyadu'an. . U-lin niyadu'武陵區 U-lin niyadu' u Hu-nan sen Cen-de se a se-sia niyadu'an, itida i Hu-nan-sen amisan, Cen-de se teban mikiamis tu, nutipan a kitidaan nu Tun-ten hu. pulung nu niyadu' 298 pin-fun-ku-lin, tademaw 74 wan ku tadeamw, niyaduay a sifu itid i pinhu-cunli-hupin-sin. U-lin niyaduan mapatideng i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu walu a bataan ida ku walu (1988) mihcaan. kuo-u-yen cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku walu (1988) mihcaan cacay bulat 23 demiad lawpesen kina Cen-de niyadu'an, Cen-de sin, sin a Cen-de-se, mapatiden ku Cen-de-se, Den-cen niyadu' atu U-lin niyadu', U-lin niyaduan naw sin-ci a Cen-de-se atu Cen-de-sin nipikenisan tu U-lin, Duo-mu-hu, He-hu, Se-men-ciaw sepat a cenan atu Dan-cuo, Kan-cia-ci, Nan-pen-kan, He-hu, Lu-huo-san lima a niyadu'an katukuh i U-lin-niyadu'. Ten-cen niyadu' kina miduducay tu tawyaay a kinngan u Cen-de-se kitidaan. . di'tu nu buhung a dihep 鬼谷洞 di'tu nu buhung a dihep itida i Cung-kuo sen Kuy-si se Len-suy cen mati niyadu'an yun-mun buyu' a tatelecan nu buyu'an, itida i Lung-hu buyu' nu wali timulan, u tulu a bataan idaw ku enem nu buhung tu saka lima a buhangan. " min-yi-tun-ce" idaw ku ni sulitan: ci di'tu tatama ngangan nida ci Wan-yi, cun-ciw-cin-pin-kun se tademaw, hina tayda i buyu' mikilim tu sasapayuan, takelal ku nanum nu sauwac mahida u diphep nu di'tu, ku nika si nganganan. di'tu nu buhung a dihe sasa naw idaw ku aadihan tu samian u cen-yi-pay, u taw-ciaw saka sabaw lima a buhang nu ten-fun-se sami atu ten-se-ti'-ti a kitidaan, kalingatuan misangay itida i Nan-tan, sa kina pinaan a misangan,sa siliwan katukuh ayda. cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku walu (1998) mihcaan itida tu kiya sasing ni Kuy-ku sasamian. .

== Ten-men-san " cen-cia-cei" 天門山 == Ten-min-san " igo : Tianmen Moontain" itida i Cong-koo Ho-nan-sen Cen-cia-cei se Ion-ten niyadoan, pakonida sananay a aadihan no Ten-men-ton a nikasinganganan, nika hinian no Ten-men-ton sa katinengan no kitakid, pangangan han o "Sin-si sakacacay no di'to a boyo'", "U-lin adingo" ato "Cen-cia-cei adingo". 天門山(英語:Tianmen Moontain) ". Ho-nan-sen " Seng a kamo Cen-yi-pen-sin-pay Cen-sa kamo /fo13 lã13 sən41/, seng-yi-loo-saw-pen song-fon kamo /ɣəo13 nia13 siɛn31, )itida i Cong-hoa-zen-min-kon-he-koo hoa-cong kitidaan a sakacacay no sincenci, polong no kitidaan itida i Cen-cieng taban no timola a kitidaan, hamin itida namin i Ton-tin-ho timola o " Ho-nan", mibetas to Sieng-cieng sisa " Sieng han". idaw ko langaw no ho-zon " mo-ho-zon", nikodan Tan ci Tan-on sasasolitan nida to coda " milabi to sadingsing i Sieng-cieng kalikelohan ko odad" idaw ko " yadahay no ho-zon a sadingsingan no kanatal" a sasakamoen, idaw saca to " ho-zon-kanatal". Ho-nan a sen-hoy cen-sa-se, Ho-nan niyado'an a kamo o Sing-yi ko sasakamoen.doma sato itida i Ho-nan-sen no domaan a kitidaan o Si-nan kamo, cen kamo, sing-nan tada kamo, wa-sing kamo ato ngayngay a kamo to doma a sasakamoen, nikahida, miw kamo, tada kamo, ton kamo, men kamo " yiw binacadan a tapang no kamoan" pinaay no binacadan a kamoan itida i Ho-nan-sen tipan ato timola no pinaay a binacadan ko micokaymasay tina kamoan. :/fo13 lã13 sən41/；湘語婁邵片雙峰話:/ɣəo13 nia13 siɛn31/), . Ion-tin-ci o Cong-koo Ho-nan-sen Cen-cia-cie se a se-sia niyado'an. polong no niyado' pin-fon-kon-li, tademaw 52 wan ko tademaw. 52萬人. Ten-men-ton itida i Cong-koo Ho-nan sen cen-cia-cie Ten-san-men, talakaw 131.5 mi, ahebal 57 mi, i labo 60 mi, i kitakid satalakaway a hida sananay mibetasay to boyo' ay a zon-ton. . lalangaw 文化 hedek no Yen-caw, ci Cen-doy miales cinida to sakakaay taloma' malikeloh nida ci Yen-coo. ci Yen-coo kolitan nida ko Ten-men-san, ci Cen-doy codad hanida ato mikolit: " masalaliw ko bali i labo no Ten-men-don, isasa ko Cin-ton-e-mei .", sakamosa : " kana matabal a silaheci, ko mababiyaw kiya i sasa no boyo'. Cin-caw mosolitan to codad ci Yi-ci-moo saan: " amica ko nipangawan to talakaway a boyo', idaw ko sakatayda i pabaw." ." Sing-si to cia-co miw kitidaan " tada kamo Xianxxix bifzivkar befkar zifzifzoox,sing-si-miw kamo:Xangdxid totjadcol maolcol zibzhibzhood, dayomen pangangan Sing-si-coo, o Cong-hoa-zen-min-kon-he-koo Ho-nan sen a ce-ce'-coo, itida i Ho-nan-sen tipan amisan. micapi to wali amis katokoh i Cen-cia-cei se, wali timo sibiyaw to Hoy-hoa se, notipan timolan sikenis to Koy-coo sen Ton-zen se, notipan sibiyaw to Con-cin se, notipan amisa mitolin to Ho-pei sen N-se coo. :Xianxxix bifzivkar befkar zifzifzoox,湘西苗語:Xangdxid totjadcol maolcol zibzhibzhood), . o lala' no U-lin-boyo'an ato Uen-koy boyo' a niyado'a, labo no boyo' idaw ko masaenalay ato mililisay to dihep a saowacan, U-lin boyo' a tapan katokoh i cong po, mala wali amis -notipan timolan ko nipasayda ko colil, wali tipan o Yen-cin saowac a sakay sasa to no dihepan a boyo'an, labo no boyo' yadah ko baba'toan. Yen saowac nikalaliwan no nanom i U- saowa, Yio saowac ko angangangan. polong no coo makaala to 15,470 pin-fon kon-li, tademaw 246,1 wan ko tademawan, to-cia binacadan, miw binacadan kakenihan hakiya to 43%,34%, ce-ce'-coo o tokay itida i Ci-soo se zen-min-pie-lo 58 ko banggo. 58號. loit 歷史 Sing-si-coo kitidaan o matenesay to. sang tay, o di'toan a kitidaan. Si-coo katokoh to con ciw, o co-cen a kitidaan. cen-koo tawya o co-cen kitidaan. si han o U-lin kitidaan. toloay a kanatalan to lingato o So, nikodan sato o U. Si-cin, Ton-cin o cin-coo U-lin kitidaan. soy tan lima a dayan o Cen-coo. Son o Cin-ho-pei-lo a Cen-coo, Fong-coo. Yen o Ho-kon-han sen N-coo cin-min-an-ho-se, Sin-ten-ke-loan anhose ato Se-con sin-sen ion-son se. min-ce-ion-son sin-wi se, paw-cin-coo sin-wi se, liwan o Yi,cen tosa a kitidaan. Cin-ce-ion-son ho ato fon-hong, Cin-coo, Ion-soy celiten, wali amis o Fon coo kitidaan. minkoo seci. cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo cacay a bataan idaw ko sepat -cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo tosa a bataan idaw ko tosa (1914-1922) mihcaan o Cen-yen-taw o Cen-yen-taw. cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo sepat a bataan idaw ko siwa – cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo sepat a bataan idaw ko siwa (1938—1949) mihcaan o saka walo saka siwa a sincen toca niyado'an. . U-lin niyado'武陵區 U-lin niyado' o Ho-nan sen Cen-de se a se-sia niyado'an, itida i Ho-nan-sen amisan, Cen-de se teban mikiamis to, notipan a kitidaan no Ton-ten ho. polong no niyado' 298 pin-fon-ko-lin, tademaw 74 wan ko tadeamw, niyadoay a sifo itid i pinho-conli-hopin-sin. U-lin niyadoan mapatideng i cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo walo a bataan ida ko walo (1988) mihcaan. koo-o-yen cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo walo a bataan idaw ko walo (1988) mihcaan cacay bolat 23 demiad lawpesen kina Cen-de niyado'an, Cen-de sin, sin a Cen-de-se, mapatiden ko Cen-de-se, Den-cen niyado' ato U-lin niyado', U-lin niyadoan naw sin-ci a Cen-de-se ato Cen-de-sin nipikenisan to U-lin, Doo-mo-ho, He-ho, Se-men-ciaw sepat a cenan ato Dan-coo, Kan-cia-ci, Nan-pen-kan, He-ho, Lo-hoo-san lima a niyado'an katokoh i U-lin-niyado'. Ten-cen niyado' kina midodocay to tawyaay a kinngan o Cen-de-se kitidaan. . di'to no bohong a dihep 鬼谷洞 di'to no bohong a dihep itida i Cong-koo sen Koy-si se Len-soy cen mati niyado'an yon-mon boyo' a tatelecan no boyo'an, itida i Long-ho boyo' no wali timolan, o tolo a bataan idaw ko enem no bohong to saka lima a bohangan. " min-yi-ton-ce" idaw ko ni solitan: ci di'to tatama ngangan nida ci Wan-yi, con-ciw-cin-pin-kon se tademaw, hina tayda i boyo' mikilim to sasapayoan, takelal ko nanom no saowac mahida o diphep no di'to, ko nika si nganganan. di'to no bohong a dihe sasa naw idaw ko aadihan to samian o cen-yi-pay, o taw-ciaw saka sabaw lima a bohang no ten-fon-se sami ato ten-se-ti'-ti a kitidaan, kalingatoan misangay itida i Nan-tan, sa kina pinaan a misangan,sa siliwan katokoh ayda. cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo siwa a bataan idaw ko walo (1998) mihcaan itida to kiya sasing ni Koy-ko sasamian. .
